name: Zen Pet: Stack It Up
description:
Playing with pets is always fun! Especially if you can stack them up!

Look at the items and carefully place them so that everything stay in place. Play with a variety of cute animals from a puppy, a kitten and even a unicorn!

Features :
* Cheerful and colorful theme, gives you the happy vibe!
* Handmade levels!
* realistic physics!
* Lots of animals to play with!
